io.micronaut.security.oauth2.endpoint.authorization.response

Class AbstractAuthorizationResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.security.oauth2.endpoint.authorization.response.StateAwareAuthorizationCallback
      • io.micronaut.security.oauth2.endpoint.authorization.response.AbstractAuthorizationResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorizationResponse, StateAware
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultOauthAuthorizationResponse, DefaultOpenIdAuthorizationResponse

    public abstract class AbstractAuthorizationResponse
extends StateAwareAuthorizationCallback
implements AuthorizationResponse
    A base class for authorization responses to extend from.

    1.2.0
    Author:
    James Kleeh
